sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that
\[
	\frac{d }{y - z } = \frac{e }{z - x } = \frac{f }{x - y }
\]
Then prove that
\[
	xd + ye + zf = 0
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 
It is given that
\[
	\frac{d }{y - z } = \frac{e }{z - x } = \frac{f }{x - y } = k \textrm{ (assume)}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow d = k (\input[s2v1]{} - \input[s2v2]{} ) 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow e = k (z - \input[s3v1]{} )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow f = k (\input[s3v2]{} - y )
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, lets consider the given expression
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = xd + ye + zf 
\]
\[
	= x\input[s4v1]{} (y - z ) + yk (z - x ) + z\input[s4v2]{} (x - y )
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= k \left[x (y - z ) + y (z - x ) + z (x - y )\right]
\]
\[
	= k \left[xy - xz + y\input[s5v1]{} - xy + xz - \input[s5v2]{}z \right]
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	= k (\input[s6v1]{})
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " 
\[
	= 0 = \textrm{ RHS}
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Assuming $\frac{d }{y - z } = \frac{e }{z - x } = \frac{f }{x - y } = k$}$$"}, {"data": ["y", "z"], "text": "$$\text{Taking term $d$ separately, we get $ d = k (y - z ) $}$$"}, {"data": ["x", "x"], "text": "$$\text{Similarly, taking terms $ e $ and $ f $ separately, we get $e = k (z - x )$ and $f = k (x - y )$}$$ "}, {"data": ["k", "k"], "text": "$$\text{Taking expression $ xd + ye + zf $, and substituting for the value of $d$, $e$, and $f$, we get LHS $=xk (y - z ) + yk (z - x ) + zk (x - y )$}$$"}, {"data": ["z", "y"], "text": "$$\text{Taking $k$ as common and opening the portion inside the bracket we get $k \left[xy - xz + yz - xy + xz - yz \right]$}$$"}, {"data": [0], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplification previous expression, we get $k (0)$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
